description: MVVM, bare knuckle style! Ultra lightweight component suite for Model-View-ViewModel based applications. Binaries only.
releaseNotes:
1.1.2 - adding Blue.MVVM.Lib to projects that target .NET 4.5 now references the 4.5 assemblies instead of 4.0 assemblies
      1.1.1 - Separated Blue.MVVM and Blue.MVVM.Lib
summary:
Blue.MVVM is, and will remain, an ultra lightweight suite supporting your Model-View-ViewModel (MVVM) based applications.

      =================================
      about this package
      ---------------------------------
      This package includes binaries only. You should use this package for test projects or assemblies that need to interact with types in Blue.MVVM.
      For a head start using Blue.MVVM, and for best integration in you wonderful apps, use Blue.MVVM (http://www.nuget.org/packages/Blue.MVVM/) instead.
      ---------------------------------

      =================================
      what to expect in future updates?
      ---------------------------------
      There are many ideas around regarding upcoming releases of the Blue.MVVM suite.
      However, those updates will be shipped in form of additional packages, so you can click your MVVM-framework together which best fits your needs.

      Upcoming releases may include, but are not limited to:
      - XML-commentaries
      - packages with samples
      - validation
      - message broker
      - IoC-Container integration
      - many more...

      So stay tuned for updates!
      ---------------------------------

      Send feedback, feature-request, unexpected breaking changes, etc. via the projects nuget-page, http://www.nuget.org/packages/Blue.MVVM.Lib/ContactOwners, until there is no projet homepage...
title: Blue.MVVM.Lib
